comments:
Eclipse Version:

I20061121-1845

Overview:

Error only occurs using the open cheat sheet action that takes a raw XML String
as a parameter and the simple and composite cheat sheet are in the same
directory.
Everything is fine if the simple cheat sheet is referred to in a directory
above or below the composite cheat sheet
(e.g. '../s.xml', 'sub/s.xml')

Steps To Reproduce:  	

(1) Save attachement #1 (c.xml) and attachment #2 (s.xml) in the same directory
    in your workspace
(2) Open 'c.xml' using the composite cheat sheet editor
(3) Click the 'Preview' button
(4) In the cheat sheet view, proceed through the steps

An exception is encountered when trying to accessing the first Task

Exception:

java.lang.StringIndexOutOfBoundsException: String index out of range: -2
